title: GDP #007: Creation of the Russian DIA group
body:
[Proposal submitted by DAO member Artur on Nov 2, 2021](https://dao.diadata.org/t/creation-of-the-russian-dia-group/77)

### Introduction
My suggestion is to create a Russian Dia Group in order to improve marketing and attract the Russian community.

### Problem
In my opinion, the problem lies in the absence of a Russian-speaking community.

### Context
A lot of people do not know English and would like to receive news and messages about events and discussions of this project in Russian. It would help people understand the project and there would be fewer questions. In addition, many people will be ready to join the project if there is a Russian community there.

### Solution
First, create a group in telegram.
My colleague and I are ready to promote it.

### Benefits
Involvement and interest of more people in the project. To tell and help the Russian-speaking community.

### Costs
At your discretion.

### Risks
There are no risks

### Vote
 1) Yes, we are creating a Russian group "DIA"
2) No, we are not creating a Russian group "DIA"
choices: No, not create a Russian group
author: 0xEBD87c395fEa29C2f0e13e34548681267F0FAFe6
